text: us (arthaat noohî€¼) ne kahaah he meree jaati ke logo! tumane is baat par vichaar kiya ki yadi main apane paalanahaar kee or se ek spasht pramaan par hoon aur mujhe usane apane paas se ek daya[1] pradaan kee ho, phir vah tumhen sujhaayee na de, to kya ham use tumase chipaka[2] den, jabaki tum use nahin chaahate
